headline: Simon Property (SPG) Reports Q1 Earnings: What Key Metrics Have to Say
summary: Although the revenue and EPS for Simon Property (SPG) give a sense of how its business performed in the quarter ended March 2025, it might be worth considering how some key metrics compare with Wall Street estimates and the year-ago numbers.

headline: Simon Property (SPG) Q1 FFO Surpass Estimates
summary: Simon Property (SPG) delivered FFO and revenue surprises of 1.37% and 0.67%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Simon Property: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The Indianapolis-based real estate investment trust said it had funds from operations of $1.11 billion, or $2.95 per share, in the period. The average estimate of nine analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for funds from operations of $2.91 per share. Funds from operations is a closely watched measure in the REIT industry.
